definition: to mark down (the price of goods)/to sell off cheap
to throw/to fling/to swing/to leave behind/to throw off/to dump (sb)
to sell/to betray/to spare no effort/to show off or flaunt

sentences.english: An example is coupons or a sale.
sentences.chinese: 一個例子是折價券或大甩賣。

sentences.english: But I'm here because Las Vegas is on sale.
sentences.chinese: 但是我在這兒了，因爲維加斯正在大甩賣。

sentences.english: Beijing Mall is having a big sale this weekend.
sentences.chinese: 親愛的，這個週末北京商廈大甩賣，你要去嗎？

sentences.english: Our weekend-long garage sale took care of most everything else.
sentences.chinese: 我們的週末車庫甩賣處理大部分其他物品。

sentences.english: Nevertheless even if is reduction sale, foolish a when girl also has him.
sentences.chinese: 不過即便是甩賣，傻妞也有自己的一套。

sentences.english: We will have a bargain sale today.
Darling, BeijingMall is having a big sale this weekend.
sentences.chinese: 親愛的，這個週末北京商廈大甩賣，你要去嗎？

sentences.english: When do you have a big sale?
sentences.chinese: 你們什麼時候有大甩賣？

sentences.english: Please come and buy clothes at Huaxing's Great sale!
sentences.chinese: 在華興大甩賣期間來買衣服吧。

sentences.english: He bought those shorts last year at an end-of-season sale.
sentences.chinese: 他在去年換季大甩賣時買了那些短褲。

sentences.english: We have a clearance sale today.
A midnight madness event starts very late at night.
sentences.chinese: 午夜瘋狂大甩賣在深夜開始。

sentences.english: I bought this top for a very cheap price at a clearance sale.
sentences.chinese: 我是在清倉大甩賣時以相當便宜的價錢買了這件上衣。

sentences.english: Autumn suits new listing, summer on big sale, buy one get free offer.
sentences.chinese: 英語秋裝上市，夏裝大甩賣，買一送一。

sentences.english: Every year, our family holds a rummage sale.
sentences.chinese: 每年，我家都要有一次棄物甩賣。
